org.lunifera.runtime.utils.osgi.component.extender

Class AbstractComponentExtender

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lunifera.runtime.utils.osgi.component.AbstractComponentBasic
      • org.lunifera.runtime.utils.osgi.component.AbstractComponentWithCompendium
        • org.lunifera.runtime.utils.osgi.component.extender.AbstractComponentExtender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentExtenderService

    public abstract class AbstractComponentExtender
extends AbstractComponentWithCompendium
implements ComponentExtenderService
    An abstract class for extender components.

    This class plus the annotation ComponentExtenderSetup aims to provide an easier way to configure an extender component.

    An extender component can receive contributions from one or more bundles (contributors) that contains a specific defined head in its manifest file.

    Since:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Cristiano Gavi√£o

    • Method Detail

      • bindContributionHandlerService

        protected void bindContributionHandlerService(ContributionHandlerService contributionHandlerService)

      • defineEventsToBeTracked

        protected void defineEventsToBeTracked()
        Description copied from class: AbstractComponentWithCompendium
        A method where developer can define which events will be automatically tracked and properly handled by this component class.

        Developer must use the method AbstractComponentWithCompendium.trackEvent(PluggableEventTracker) to register an event to be tracked.

        It is aimed to be overridden by children concrete classes.

        Overrides:
        defineEventsToBeTracked in class AbstractComponentWithCompendium

      • doRuntimePropertiesProcessing

        protected void doRuntimePropertiesProcessing(Dictionary<String,Object> properties)
        Description copied from class: AbstractComponentWithCompendium
        Do the processing of the properties passed for this component at runtime.

        This method is called in the beginning of the activation process.

        It is aimed to be overridden by children concrete classes.

        Overrides:
        doRuntimePropertiesProcessing in class AbstractComponentWithCompendium
